entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Detah
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Ice fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 50 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 30%
